title: League of Legends statistics app

embed.description: lolTracker, jungle, league, stats, points, ranked, legends, solo, queue, solo queue, summoner, summoner rif

body:
{{champion:121}}  Hey Summoners, 
 As a developer and creator of lolTracker application I would like to share it with you. I am single person who works on it and trying (now) to release new version each month. Upcoming one will include match details, simplification for tracking summoners and few smaller things. However I would like you to **like** community board and app on **Facebook** so more people will know about it. Please also leave a **comment** there. **Thanks in advance.** 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 
Feel free to add comments and suggestions with new functionality which you would like to have. I am open for suggestions. If there will be many highlights for same idea I will try to implement is ASAP.

{{item:1031}} I am playing on OCE when my GF is at work. If you would like to play with me ad and message me on lol my nickname in game is 
> Sir Shial

[lolTracker](http://loltracker.co/)
Thanks and see you in game!

replies.body: Very useful when waiting for match to load! Able to check who I'm up against in my lane and their skill level!! 10/10{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

> I am playing on OCE when my GF is at work

https://www.christart.com/IMAGES-art9ab/clipart/1769/rg-cartoon-1c.png

might give it a go.
